      • TurnSummary

        public TurnSummary(int turnNum,
                   int[][] currBoard,
                   int currPlayer,
                   Action lastMove)
        Class for statistics that contains all the details of a turn
        Parameters:
        turnNum - Stores which turn of the game this state refers to
        currBoard - The integer representation of the current board state
        currplayer - Stores which player was deciding this turn
        lastMove - Stores the last column a token was dropped
